website_summaries.verdict: A unique set that lights up your finished structure.
pros: With 50 pieces, this is a good size for building structures
Set includes 3 kinds of triangles and 3 squares/rectangles
An included rechargeable LED light lets you make the final structures glow, adding a whole new factor to the design
cons: Some users were disappointed that  the set only included one LED light piece

customer_reviews.title: Best magformers!
customer_reviews.text: We've had a bunch of magformers for years and thought this sounded like a good way to change them up a bit. The light up part is awesome! There's a number of standard building pieces included that this could be a starter set or an add-on if you already have some. There's one light unit (kinda wish there were two) that can be constantly changing colors or can be set to one color. It has a recharging cord included which is so much better than needing to replace the batteries when we forget to turn it off!
customer_reviews.author: A. Luedke

customer_reviews.title: outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: One of my sons got this as a Christmas gift and they all love it (3 boys ages 8,6 and 4). So when it was my niece's birthday (6th), I knew this would be a hit with her too. She enjoyed from the first night! What's unique about this one is that they get so much joy out of making their own nightlight.... And it's rechargeable! So the only limit is really their creativity.... And how much time they have in a day!! Lol. Small improvement that could be made is to include a pouch for storage of the pieces. None is in here, so have a storage strategy in mind.
customer_reviews.author: L. Greig

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephews are used to receiving video games and not-so-educational toys. When I bought them this set they played with it for quite awhile. There is lots of stuff you can do with them. They are even fun for adults as I found myself spending a bit of time thinking of new ways to join them. The light is nice and changes colors, but I was under the impression that it makes all of the pieces bright. This is not the case, especially if you put the structure on a non-reflective surface. I think I would rather have bought the non-lighted set which offered more pieces. Still pretty awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: v!per!

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but a good toy
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad when my grandkids opened this box the day after Christmas. They hadn't asked for it, so it was one of the last things they opened. I am 65 years old and I had a great time building things with it. They did too, and my grandson called me two days later to ask if his sister could be asked to share this gift with him. They are 5 and 7 and liked building with it. We didn't even use the light up feature when we played with it and it was still really neat.
customer_reviews.author: Bookbam

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, good for kids of varying ages (including adult kids)
customer_reviews.text: We had another magnetic toy set, however it had the small magnets that were dangerous for small kids, so when I saw this I ordered it and it is great as the little toddlers can snap pieces together and play with them, and you don't have to worry about them swallowing any pieces. Plus the older kids have fun making the different shapes and playing with the lights and shadows. I do think it is a bit overpriced though, esp considering there aren't that many pieces in it. So I'd recommend trying to find it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: shoeffeine

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter and and her parents love it
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give you a more extensive review as I usually do, but since I live in WNC and my GD is in Oregon, all i have to go by is Facetime reaction and photos -- and my granddaughter, and her parents, are extremely happy with this toy. I'm a stellar granny now - yeehaw! Will put this same review on the other Magformers I ordered for her. Your child or grandchild,and their parents, will love this. (My son played with it first *laugh* so there you go )
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Magendie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but fits together well with other Mag Former products. I have a lot of these sets for my friends kids and they (the kids and their parents) love to get them out and make various designs almost every day. A good learning tool for the kids and a good mommy and me time for the parents (or daddy and me).
customer_reviews.author: WATCHER

customer_reviews.title: Cool addition of lights to your magformers
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. These led lights kept my kids entertained day after day. These keep the kids busy creating. As an educator I'm constantly trying to challenge my 4&6 year old. Magformers do an amazing job of allowing discovery throughout developmental stages.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E Romero

customer_reviews.title: Let the kids' imagination run wild !
customer_reviews.text: Great set, different shaped parts, and enough parts to let the kids' imagination run wild with easy building complex shapes... my 8-year old and 4-year old both play with this set. The LED-light part changes colors, and adds some cook visual effects.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Key

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was such a hit with my nephews! They played with this set for a long time after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old grandson loves these! I found ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson loves these! I found out this was actually his first set. But I know his parents, other grandparents, aunts and uncles got him some more for his birthday and Christmas.. Thank you , Amazon, for helping this grandmother earn brownie points. I live in Kansas, and they live in Maryland.
customer_reviews.author: C. Funk

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 11 year old son with autism for Christmas. He has really enjoyed playing with them and so has my 9 year old daughter. So have I for that matter. They are really neat! You can make all sorts of interesting shapes and structures. Seem like good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Light
customer_reviews.text: Skip the lught set and add to get a bigger set. Magneforms are fun in themselves. The light doesnt hold a charge for long anyway. Buy an adfitional set or a larger one. Hours of Fun.
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Light up my play.
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a Christmas gift to use with other Magformers that my grandson has. He likes science now and this set is a lighted set so I'm hoping it will add to his fun.
customer_reviews.author: LCBrowning

customer_reviews.title: MagnaFormers are Magna Hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 year old grandson and He loved them, he couldn't wait to get them out of the box. They were a big hit with his daddy and 6 year old sister too. Well made, safe, colorful and with a bit of imagination can keep young and old entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mommak

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: THese are great. We have several sets and have given for gifts as well. I love the lighting effect of these, not over powering but enough to have some ambient lighting in a kids room
customer_reviews.author: Nichole T

customer_reviews.title: Four-year-old granddaughter was thrilled, and was given an additional ...
customer_reviews.text: Four-year-old granddaughter was thrilled, and was given an additional set for Christmas. All she played with for a while, and shows me what she had built each time I visit.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar ana

customer_reviews.title: Magformers 5yo boy
customer_reviews.text: My son is enjoying this and spends many hours playing with it. The only issue he has, is he wants what he makes to be more sturdy. They are only held together by magnets of course, so you need to be a little gentle with them.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Foley

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy more of these, the children love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are the most fun toys ever!!! This one is especially fun, because it also lights up. Children learn about Geometry while playing with them, and the many shapes and colors are awesome. We gave this one to our 5 year old granddaughter. We want to buy more, as we have 20 grandchildren, and all of them would love this. I wonder if there is a discount for buying 20 of them at one time. It is even more fun if you have more sets of them, and can put them together in creative ways. Adults love playing with them every bit as much as the children do.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Liveley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, imaginative toy for 5-9 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and daughter (ages 6 and 9) enjoy blending their Magformers into completely imaginative play. It's six months after Christmas 2013 and they still enjoy them! I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: JCCriv

customer_reviews.title: Can't argue with kids that love playing with it - great toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this game/contraption. Great Christmas gift for the Lego type kids in your life
customer_reviews.author: once n a while

customer_reviews.title: A favorite at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure this was my 6 yr old son's favorite toy of Christmas. He has played with them a TON along with one of his other magformer sets! They have held up well to him playing with them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Toni A.

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: I travel with this toy. Whenever we have wait time I take the pieces out and we build all kinds of things. The light is an added feature but you can build many things without it.
customer_reviews.author: The joy of reading

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was happy getting it. He likes such toys very much. It is interesting for me even.
customer_reviews.author: sergey samoylov

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We've played with Magformers before, but this is the first time we played with a lighted set. The kids loved it! kept them entertained for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Krys7654

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the family!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 yr old for a Christmas present. He loves this Magformers lighted set and so do the adults in the family. Loads of fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Geometric Shapes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think magnetic building shapes that have magnets that rotate so the pieces never repel each other, and are able to be pulled up vertically to snap together in a 3 D shape couldn't get better but it is. Add the lights was just a great idea and extends children's interest
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Very Educational
customer_reviews.text: I got my niece a set of these for her birthday but I did not have a clue how much she would love them. She never went anywhere without them. For Christmas, I got her this bigger set and she loves them. I am amazed these are not advertised more. They are fun and educational.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Love the LED Light!
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant toy - the high standard of all Magformers. The LED light is sheer delight, especially as it changes color and ignites children's imaginations with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peekay

customer_reviews.title: One happy consumer
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are the greatest and my kids love Magformers!
customer_reviews.author: USMCMama

customer_reviews.title: What a great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I wish my niece were interested in it like I am... Hopefully soon! What a great toy, although I thought the pieces themselves would light up. There's the little LED light square that does the job wonderfully, and charges with a miniusb cord.
customer_reviews.author: John Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and pretty when lit
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and pretty when lit. Works well with there magnitiles. Hours of fun. Kids are 5 and 8 boy and girl. Like them equally.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY son Love it ...... Great gift for Young men that need to work there minds
customer_reviews.author: Spencr Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Great toys with hours of entertainment for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Great toys with hours of entertainment for my kids. They're 4 and 2 and both enjoy building things with them.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: he spent all day playing with it (Dad liked it, too)
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 5 yr-old...he spent all day playing with it (Dad liked it, too).
customer_reviews.author: Tomarys

customer_reviews.title: Magformers Lighted Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for six year old. He loves it. I was glad I bought the lighted one as this seems more interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri W.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew absolutely loves this set!! I gave it to him for his birthday and he’s playing with it since!!
customer_reviews.author: Corina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my daughter who loves to play with these types of toys. She loves it! However there are not a lot of pieces to make something big. But great quality nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: lovemymia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great toy and well made. wish it came in a box for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: best toy
customer_reviews.text: my whole family play with this toy, i bought it for my 4 years old boy, and it was a great choice, the led light part was the best for him, he uses the same Led light with the R/C car set that i bought later, it's really nice Toy.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy and my nephew played with it over and over. Will buy more in the future. It is safe for smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: While charging (with USB Cord) the LED part is working. Without a cable does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as bright as it showed, but my son loves to build with them regardless
customer_reviews.author: Cristi

customer_reviews.title: A Hit
customer_reviews.text: It's the only toy a Grandpa's that my Grandson wants to play with. Very Creative and fun for me too.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Johanson

customer_reviews.title: Magformers lighted set - Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a 7 yr. old boy. He loves it and is able to build easier since it has magnets. Highly recommend. Amazon delivers on time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Xmas pressent
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves magformers and is going to be thrilled to find one that lights up. I will take a picture when he opens them.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: LED Lighted set is a must for all children
customer_reviews.text: I think if there is something named a toy, Magformers are different thing. I've expanded this Magformers set with buying another power magformers set for increasing piece number. Me and my son have very good times while playing and building things together. I recommend this product to every one every age
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet Soylu

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. He thinks it is so cool that they light up. Definitely recommend for ages 2 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy...so the kids can use their imagination...wish they weren't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Janice R. Heard

customer_reviews.title: Great?
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my nephew so I hoped he like it. Not sure if the lights worked but he hasn't complained so far so I'll just assume it works.
customer_reviews.author: BLKDRGN

customer_reviews.title: These look great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Great Grandson and did not realize they were for a little older child. Am keeping them for when he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Fun at first
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on everybody rating and how they loved it. Personally, I found the magnet pieces fun the first week. Then, I found the toy "boring" after you make all the pieces the instruction booklet gives you over and over. Its been two months since I lasted played with it with my child.
customer_reviews.author: ABC246

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment - flimsy design. Cars didnt stay charged. Sent it back. Dont waste your money. Very disappointed little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Deberk

customer_reviews.title: A sad surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this for my son as a parting gift for his long plane ride from jfk to naples. BUT when it came, the box was crushed and opened. I was really hoping that it was just a cosmetic thing on the box, but as I started to open it up, I saw that it was missing a huge chunk of pieces. I did call amazon about it and they were able to send us a brand new one. Hoping that my son will enjoy these when he comes back for another visit from Italy.
customer_reviews.author: Christian K

customer_reviews.title: Have not tried it.
customer_reviews.text: I have not even opened the Magformers Lighted Set, because I bought it for my autistic grandson for Christmas. When I saw it, I thought it looked like something he would enjoy. I hope it is as fun as advertised. If it isn't, I won't be able to return it. After this, I will not buy gifts so far in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Talberg

product_meta.title: Magformers Hi-Tech LED Lighted Set (55-pieces)
product_meta.description: Future architects are sure to enjoy the modular nature of MAGFORMERS light show, building spaceships, diamonds, stars, houses, cameras and much more! Watch them shine bright by adding an LED magnetic light! Press the light to change color and watch your creation glow in rainbow colors!
feature_bullets: Compatible with all MAGFORMERS shapes and accessories.
Neodymium Rare-Earth Magnets for guaranteed connectivity.
ABS plastic magnets conform to CE, ASTM and EN71
New geometric designs with 55 components and a rechargeable LED light
Build space ships, diamonds, stars, houses, cameras, and more!
Includes rechargeable LED light and USB cord for charging.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
